message:
The VS HTML editor was based on WebMatrixâ€™ HTML editor, which was much newer and all written in C#. The old HTML editor in Visual Studio was a mix between C++ and C#. It was old. From the nineties actually. It also had dependencies on FrontPage. Yes, FrontPage. :D
